content: get your hooks ready folks it s time to roll up those sleeves and get crocheting we are thrilled to introduce our celebration crochet hat pattern a unique winter accessory for the whole family this knit-lookalike hat pattern is made with a split single_crochet ribbing pattern in the round super simple and stunning way to show off your crochet skills in the minimalist of ways want even more pizazz why not zhuzh it up with a faux fur pom for extra style and flair we know you ll love the way it looks in a beautiful speckled hand-dyed yarn the multicolor is so dreamy are you a knitter or possibly bicrafty then get ready because there is a knit version too the jubilee knit hat pattern is designed with a similar 3x1 ribbing pattern that uses the lifted knit stitch to disperse the colors for a more varied look at marly bird we believe style and comfort should never be compromised that s why these hats are perfect even on the chilliest of days go ahead and show off your fashionable sense of style with our celebration crochet hat pattern you won t regret it
